title: Attack on pesu
content: Ps:- Old meme idk who made it

comments.body: "Give up on your dreams and die"
Damn PESU not only owns a river but an entire sea
It's just ec campus during the rains
Pls attack rvce and end our misery 🥀

What if the upper management guys are all Titans in disguise 🥸 
That makes sense though no wonder our lives are so miserable. 👁️👄👁️

Imagine, y'all are at class thinking how could this misery end and a guy screams on top of his lungs "TATAKAE" "TATAKAE" and everyone looks through the window, a brief glance , and you see that guy transforming into an absolute behemoth of a Titan. *Transforms into the founding Titan and then starts rampaging around the  campus. The day it'll be soooo freaking gooood 😫

Imagine the walls shattering and crumbling as Eren obliterated everything and ending our misery without us getting killed. 😭🙏
